revised_title: Animal Health: Past Achievements and Future Challenges in Livestock Production
tldr: This article discusses the importance of animal health in livestock production and the control and eradication of diseases. It highlights the success of disease eradication programs in the UK and the development of high-performance breeds through genetic selection. The article also addresses the challenges of maintaining healthy livestock in large, intensive units and the need for collaboration between various scientific disciplines to improve animal welfare and human health.
